p: The activities of total antioxidative capacity (T-AOC), glutathione peroxidase (GPx), total superoxide dismutase (T-SOD), and catalase (CAT) and the plasma concentrations of thiobarbituric acid reactive substances (TBARS) were detected using colorimetric methods with a spectrophotometer (Biomate 5, Rochester, NY, USA). The assays were carried out using commercial kits (Nanjing Jiancheng Bioengineering Institute, Nanjing, Jiangsu, China) and their corresponding procedures. The assays were performed in triplicate.
